###
### Mayhem 2.0: No Extra Drop Scaling
###
### Mayhem 2.0 increases the drop rates pretty significantly, and when
### combined with my Better Loot mod, it's totally absurd.  I'm happy
### with my Better Loot drop weighting, so this should de-scale the
### loot so that Mayhem 2.0 modes are no different than in normal.
###
### Generated by gen_mayhem2_no_drop_scaling.py
###

prefix: M2DropScaling

# Mayhem 1
SparkPatchEntry,(1,2,0,),/Game/PatchDLC/Mayhem2/Abilities/CoreModifierSets/Table_Mayhem2CoreModifierSet.Table_Mayhem2CoreModifierSet,1,DropWeightCommonScalar_21_59A2FB124E32B955768A7B9D93C25A99,0,,1
SparkPatchEntry,(1,2,0,),/Game/PatchDLC/Mayhem2/Abilities/CoreModifierSets/Table_Mayhem2CoreModifierSet.Table_Mayhem2CoreModifierSet,1,DropWeightUncommonScalar_25_809615334E7F0DB3B8712DAC221015C3,0,,1
SparkPatchEntry,(1,2,0,),/Game/PatchDLC/Mayhem2/Abilities/CoreModifierSets/Table_Mayhem2CoreModifierSet.Table_Mayhem2CoreModifierSet,1,DropWeightRareScalar_27_A09CF5314C51796896A83EA0806C7520,0,,1
SparkPatchEntry,(1,2,0,),/Game/PatchDLC/Mayhem2/Abilities/CoreModifierSets/Table_Mayhem2CoreModifierSet.Table_Mayhem2CoreModifierSet,1,DropWeightVeryRareScalar_29_F2CA570046CD50A7C514EDB0AE1BE591,0,,1
SparkPatchEntry,(1,2,0,),/Game/PatchDLC/Mayhem2/Abilities/CoreModifierSets/Table_Mayhem2CoreModifierSet.Table_Mayhem2CoreModifierSet,1,DropWeightLegendaryScalar_31_D9DA03C54065EA981BE218B11942C24E,0,,1
